ygData.subject: Re: JBOOTS:  I Need Them Bad....
ygData.msgSnippet: 3,250 gold...not 325pp..  easiest way to get this to him is bind yourself near where he is, travel to the bank, then gate back when you have the money.  Other
ygData.messageBody:
3,250 gold...not 325pp.. easiest way to get this to him is bind yourself
near where he is, travel to the bank, then gate back when you have the
money. Other wise, you'll be too overweigt to walk faster than snare.

Ring of the Ancients comes off of a named giant somewhere in OOT I believe.
It's 45th lvl I believe as well.




----- Original Message -----
From: Dino Buffetta <DBuffett@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 9:38 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] JBOOTS: I Need Them Bad....


> From: "Dino Buffetta" <DBuffett@...>
>
> Has anyone gotten the Jboots from the new Quest and/or do they spawn in
Najena still?
>
> What lvl solo and grouped can a necro get the items?
>
> 1. Shadowmen weapon. Which is no rent ....
> 2. Ring of the Ancients from a Ancient cyclops (from where? I hear OOT)
> 3. 3,250 gold (must this be gold or can it be 325 plat???
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
